text:
ruSa#d-dRuqSE da#dRuSE naktaqyA ciqdarU$kShitaM dRuqSa A rUqpE anna$M || 
sainA&nI#kEna suviqdatrO# aqsmE yaShTA# dEqvA(gm) Aya#jiShThaH svaqsti | 
ada#bdhO gOqpA uqta na#H paraqspA agnE$ dyuqmaduqta rEqvad di#dIhi || 
svaqsti nO# diqvO a#gnE pRuthiqvyA viqSvAyu#d^^rdhEhi yaqjathA#ya dEva | 
yath sIqmahi# divijAtaq praSa#staqM tadaqsmAsuq dravi#NaM dhEhi ciqtraM || 
yathA# hOtaqrmanu#ShO - [  ] 30
